description: Behavioral Symptoms Index composite scale (parent rated)
demonstration of clear, logical thought patterns and a general awareness of surroundings (parent rated)
avoid social situations and appears to be capable of developing and maintaining friendships with others (parent rated)
maintain necessary levels of attention (parent rated)
adaptation to most situations and able to quickly recover from situations that are difficult (parent rated)
socially adept and at ease (parent rated)
creative, works well under pressure, and/or can effectively unite others to work together (parent rated)
able to adequately perform simple daily tasks in a safe and efficient manner (parent rated)
exhibits appropriate expressive and receptive communication skills and displays a strong ability to seek out and find new information independently (parent rated)
